perienced midwife or a medical officer.
2. If there is doubt about the significance of a finding compare it to previous tracings.
3. When in doubt, continue the tracing until it becomes clear whether there is cause for concern or not.
4. Always document your interpretation of the CTG trace (see Documentation, below)
